lead_paragraph: More agencies helping refugees and migrants arriving in Greece said they were joining a boycott of detention centers.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Greece: Aid Groups Resist Migrant Deal
headline.main: Greece: Aid Groups Resist E.U. Migrant Deal With Turkey

snippet: More agencies helping refugees and migrants arriving in Greece said they were joining a boycott of detention centers.
abstract: Growing number of aid agencies supporting refugees and migrants entering Europe are pulling back services at Greek detention centers, stating that current practice of deporting people who fail application process to Turkey is 'unfair and inhumane.'
